summary: On their last night of Thanksgiving break, four old friends, now all college freshmen, realize their small town has more meaning than they ever imagined.
cast: Aaron Ashmore|Johnny Lewis|Justin Mentell|Autumn Reeser|Ben Savage|Ryan Hansen|Connor Ross|Eve Brent|Shoshana Bush|Rosalie Ward|Tom Arnold|Robin Hines|Matthew Castellana|Jason McMahon|Edward Singletary|Hailey Bright|Christina DeRosa|Jay Joshua Hoffman|Alona Lewis|Luka Apt
title: Palo Alto, CA
